title: Podcasting Aspersions
itunes:title: Podcasting Aspersions
description:
This week we touch on all the big events going on in the Giant Bomb universe, then turn our attention to the coming E3-ish announcement season, including State of Play reactions, expectations for Summer Game Fest and the Xbox showcase, Mayor Haggar's endless term of office, pressing questions about Norman Reedus' situational awareness, and more!

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

(00:00:00) NOTE: Some timecodes may be inaccurate in versions other than the ad-free Patreon version due to dynamic ad insertions. Please use caution if skipping around to avoid spoilers. Thanks for listening.

(00:00:10) Intro

(00:01:28) Show Rundown

(00:02:41) The Giant Bomb and Jeff Gerstmann news

(00:09:36) There's even more news out there

(00:11:08) Summer Game Fest doings

(00:19:34) Sony's recent State of Play

(00:20:04) RE4 Remake

(00:21:43) Horizon Call of the Mountain

(00:25:53) Spider-Man Remastered on PC

(00:28:34) Rollerdrome

(00:29:41) Callisto Protocol

(00:30:58) Stray

(00:31:57) Street Fighter VI

(00:39:20) Final Fantasy XVI

(00:44:12) First Break

(00:44:27) Dragon Age 4 gets a title

(00:49:35) Hideo Kojima's new horror game

(00:56:01) GoldenEye HD is actually coming out?

(01:01:21) Second Break

(01:01:25) Video games

(01:01:38) Quick news update about Resident Evils on next gen

(01:03:51) Hardspace: Shipbreaker [PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Jun 16, 2020

(01:08:50) Citizen Sleeper [Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch] on May 05, 2022

(01:13:23) Pac-Man Museum+ [Xbox One, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox Series X|S] on May 27, 2022

(01:17:00) Gibbon: Beyond the Trees

(01:19:06) Vampire Survivors [PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Dec 17, 2021

(01:23:41) Destiny 2: The Witch Queen [PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5] on Feb 22, 2022

(01:29:56) Wrapping up and Nextlander Anniversary updates

(01:31:39) Mysterious Benefactor Tier Shoutouts

(01:33:37) Coming up on Nextlander

(01:34:39) See ya!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
